item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/risky-beauty-business/#comment-586">Suzi</a>.
Ha! Thanks, girl! That's the best, right? When a risk pays off, and you get to be all, "I knew it."
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Suzi.

Ha! Thanks, girl! That’s the best, right? When a risk pays off, and you get to be all, “I knew it.”

item.title: By: Suzi
item.dc:creator: Suzi
item.description: I love this color on you!! You look like such a badass...but a classy badass! The end result is totally worth the risk.
item.content:encoded: I love this color on you!! You look like such a badass…but a classy badass! The end result is totally worth the risk.

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/risky-beauty-business/#comment-572">Dina Lopez</a>.
Thanks! My fingers are all blue right now, but it's worth it.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Dina Lopez.

Thanks! My fingers are all blue right now, but it’s worth it.

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/risky-beauty-business/#comment-573">robinlcole</a>.
Right on! Dirty Thirties! Hahaha! I do try to do crazy things in more grownup ways, you know? Like I said the cut had to be sophisticated. I want to look age appropriate but I still want to do the things I like. It's a fine line!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to robinlcole.

Right on! Dirty Thirties! Hahaha! I do try to do crazy things in more grownup ways, you know? Like I said the cut had to be sophisticated. I want to look age appropriate but I still want to do the things I like. It’s a fine line!

item.title: By: robinlcole
item.dc:creator: robinlcole
item.description:
Thank you so much for making this post; it's great to know I'm not alone in often having the very same feelings!! I too get stuck way too often in a rut or even just in my comfort zone; lately, I've been lost just like that. I needed to hear something like this today.
I constantly try to remind myself that being in my thirties doesn't mean I can't get a little crazy and try new things. Next time I'm letting myself get hung up on wondering if I'm "too old" for that hot pink lipstick or a crazy new hair color, I'm going to re-read this post!
item.content:encoded:
Thank you so much for making this post; it’s great to know I’m not alone in often having the very same feelings!! I too get stuck way too often in a rut or even just in my comfort zone; lately, I’ve been lost just like that. I needed to hear something like this today.

I constantly try to remind myself that being in my thirties doesn’t mean I can’t get a little crazy and try new things. Next time I’m letting myself get hung up on wondering if I’m “too old” for that hot pink lipstick or a crazy new hair color, I’m going to re-read this post!

item.description: Your hair is amazing! Love it
